page.title: 01Summary of area
page.content: Summary of the area as a whole; a description of the Manningtree area including housing, Mistley Church, Manningtree School (4 pages). Life around Manningtree includes community work undertaken by the school, the swimming pool for the school and the community and the sponsored walk for support of this pool (3 pages). Entertainment includes the Manifest Theatre and local events such as The Tendring Hundred Show (2 pages). Historical aspects include 16th century to 19th century buildings in Dedham and Lawford (2 pages). Pollution and its effect on ecology (1 page). Industry in the area both large and small eg Bexford Industries for plastics and Foxash Growers an agricultural application (2 pages). By Mrs. E.K.Griffin, Teacher
